thread.title: SWEET! Rajamouli's Special Support For Rudhramadevi
thread.title_full: SWEET! Rajamouli's Special Support For Rudhramadevi

title: SWEET! Rajamouli's Special Support For Rudhramadevi
text:
Receive all updates via Facebook. Just Click the Like Button Below Don't ask Again 
Rajamouli , who is popularly known as a plain hearted person, is once again proving himself as a sport by showing great interest in Gunasekhar 's Rudhramadevi . 
By now, it is common knowledge that Rudhramadevi is a dream project of Gunasekhar and he has spent all his earnings to make it come alive. He has almost gone bankrupt while making the film and has been fighting the odds for a while now. 
Apparently, he is finally releasing the film this Friday, i.e; October 9 amidst huge expectations. On a happier note, the director cum producer has got a tax exemption from the Telangana Government, for which he breathed a big sigh of relief. 
Rajamouli too have displayed his happiness over the news, through twitter. He opined it would be nice if Andhra Pradesh Government also does the same and encourage the film. 
Also, the other day, he tweeted a series of tweets on his interest to watch Rudhramadevi and shared how excited his entire family is, to witness the epic drama. 
Not only Rajamouli, many big shots from the industry are working towards a glitch free release of Rudhramadevi and has been extending their valuable support for director Gunasekhar. 
Looks like, entire Telugu industry is again coming together to support a film like they previously did for Baahubali . SWEET! Rajamouli's Special Support For Rudhramadevi 1/6 Just heard that #Rudhramadevi has been made tax free in Telangana.
